Name: GORILLA MIND DIGITAL GIFT CARD
Description:
Not sure what your loved one's favorite Gorilla Mind products or flavors are? No worries - everyone loves a gift card for their favorite store!

Gorilla Mind Digital Gift Cards are delivered via email and contain a unique code that can be redeemed during checkout. A digital gift card holds a balance, which can be spent over more than one order. When used, digital gift card balances are applied to the total value of an order, which includes taxes and shipping. 
If the balance available on a gift card is greater than or equal to the order total, you can complete your purchase with no further payment necessary.

If the balance available on the gift card is less than the order total, then you will be prompted to choose a second payment method to cover the remaining balance before placing the order.
Our Digital Gift Cards never expire, and they can only be redeemed at our store (gorillamind.com). There are no additional processing fees, and the recipient will be able to redeem the full balance of the gift card you have purchased.
Please note that gift cards will not be offered at discounted rates during sale periods, and they are not eligible for any coupon code discounts.
